import React from 'react' import './styles.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { removeFromCart, selectItems, selectTotal } from '../../slices/cartSlice' function Cart({open, setOpen}) { //To display cart items const items = useSelector(selectItems) //To display total price const total = useSelector(selectTotal) //To remove item from cart const dispatch = useDispatch() const removeItem = (id) => { dispatch(removeFromCart({id})) } return (
